name: Kitty's Quest
description:
In this retro-style metroidvania game, explore an underground ruins in search for treasure! Inspired by games such as Metroid and You Have to Win the Game, embark on a journey through dangerous dungeons and evil enemies.

YOU ARE SIR MITTENS.
A SMALL CAT, IN A MASSIVE,
WINDING RUIN.
FIND A WAY OUT.
YOU ARE ON A QUEST, FOR TUNA.
 GO, KITTY, GO!!

Made with GalaEngine! This is the first game made with my very own game engine.

Playtime: ~40-60 minutes.
Credits: Game programming, sound, and in-game graphics by me (Colleen). Game thumbnail by my friend, Florence (@florensicz on Instagram).

KNOWN BUG: Crash on Windows when closing the game. I don't have a Windows debugger! So it probably won't get patched anytime soon. It doesn't crash on Linux, though.
